712504f-a.text:
38th Street, 8th Avenue to 9th.(Before Reconstruction).
President Borough of Manhattan.
GAMIT LINE IMPERATIVE.  December 7, 1919.

710168f-a.text:
Eighth Avenue, east side, north from S. W. corner of 38th Street.
May 27, 1929.
P.L. Sperr,Photographer.

712503f-a.text:
Garment Center, 38th Street, north side, east from but not including Eighth Avenue.
About 1927.
Ewing Galloway.

710167f.text:
Eighth Avenue, (thru Centre) north from W. 37th Street (foreground intersection) as viewed from the Printing Crafts Building at the S.W. corner of this avenue and W. 34th Street. TNe two prominent structures seen are (from right to left) at the S.V. corner of 38th Street and the N.R. corner of 37th Street respectively. The latter houses the American Union Bank. Note the Times Annex tower across the roof of same and the Times Bldg. to the east.
About 1927.
Ewing Galloway

710169f.text:
North on Eighth Avenue from 38th Street.
April 1925.
Brown Brothers, Photographers.
